item.title: G-Max Coalossal Steam Engine Sweeper (Sw/Sh Doubles)
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: G-Max Coalossal can outspeed and OHKO almost anything with this Steam Engine Weakness Policy doubles team for Pokemon Sword & Shield.

item.title: Thief Tagging Build – Guild Wars 2
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: This Thief tagging build focuses on getting credit for as many enemies as possible in large group content like Meta Events and PvE Zergs.

item.title: Hildryn Build: Invulnerable Defy Spammer
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Hildryn can regain the shield spent on Defy during its invulnerability, allowing her to spam Defy forever and making her nearly invincible.

item.title: Long Survival Solo: Steel Essence Farm
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: With this specialized Octavia build, you can stay in a Survival mission for as long as you want. With infinite invisibility and damage that scales off of your enemies, multi-hour Survivals are easy. This build even works with Steel Path, making it a great Steel Essence farm in addition to the other resources you’ll be […]

item.title: Archaeo-Freighter Solo – Grendel Mission (Neuroptics)
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Learn the easiest way to beat Archaeo-Freighter solo and earn your Grendel Neuroptics blueprint using this speciallized Hildryn build.

item.description: Learn the easiest way to beat the Mine of Karishh solo and earn your Grendel Systems blueprint using this speciallized Limbo strategy.
